ehidi niwasa kada iwath nokarana poronduwata amatharawa katholika sabhawa illamin thibena adhyapanayata adala samahara illimda labadena bawa aarakshaka lekamwaraya ema gamanedi porondu wi atha.aarakshaka lekamwaraya saha kolambaa sandhanaye purapathi apekshaka milinda moragoda kolambaa wasiyan ema niwasawalin iwath karanne niwasa sada bawa puna puna kiwath nagarika sanwardhana adhikariye liyawili anuwa penenne niwasawalin iwath karana janayata masikawa rupiyal 8000ka kuli mudalakda, ese kuli niwasiyanwimata akamathi pirisa sandaha atharamadi kandawuruda, thawakalika niwasada idikarana bawaya.danata kolambaa nagara sabha mathiwaranaya wenuwen thawakalikawa pasupasata gena thibena me salasum siyalla mathiwaranayen pasu karaliyata eema siduwanu athi athara supurudu porondu deshapalanayata ha mahathma deshapalanayata dos thabamin kolambaa janayata hulla hulla sitimata siduwanu atha.
